examples: The waiter brought us the bill after we finished eating.
The bird had a long, curved bill for catching fish.
El camarero nos trajo la factura después de terminar de comer.
El ave tenía un pico largo y curvo para atrapar peces.

suggested: Why did the $5 bill feel lonely? Because it had no one to dollar with.
I can't pay this month's bill, I don't know what to do.
Why do bills always come at the worst possible time?
Did you know that the first US paper currency was printed in denominations of $1, $2, $3, $5, $10, $20, $50, $100, $500, $1000, and $5000 bills?
The physical dimensions of a US $100 bill are 2.61 inches by 6.14 inches.
I usually pay my bills online to save time and paper.
A bill can also refer to a proposed law that is under consideration by a legislature.
